title: Mastery tokens not showing in inventory?
body: I've had two games recently where I got an S rating on lvl 5 mastery champions, the animation saying I received the token came up but isn't in my crafting inventory. Any ideas?

replies.body: I'd like to look into this further. Can you [**provide a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) for the matches or link them directly from your match history?

Sure, I don't recall which one of these two was the Ezreal game since it doesn't record ratings but it should be here:

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2406802314/48577699?tab=overview

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2406856461/48577699?tab=overview

Thank you.

Ah, these were Ascension matches, which is why you didn't earn a token. You can **only** earn mastery tokens in Summoner's Rift Normal *or* Ranked matches.

I hope that clears up the confusion! ^.^
I had a feeling but thought since it said it gave mastery points, tokens would apply as well. Thank you for the clarity!
